Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Main Turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: Main tank cannon.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: MG Turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: Mahcine Gun Turret.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.Name: TGBM_VVECoaxialLMGBase
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: coaxial machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted variant of a rifle-caliber machine gun. For when one wants to conserve main gun ammo, or not use it at all. Generally recommended to grab it and hold the trigger during an assault or defense.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.Name: TGBM_VVEPintleLMG
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: pintle-mounted machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted variant of a rifle-caliber machine gun. Generally recommended to grab it and hold the trigger during an assault or defense.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: pintle-mounted machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A wide-caliber mounted heavy machine gun. Effective for tearing down cover, taking down large targets and destroying limbs with its solid slugs.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: coaxial flamethrower
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted flamethrower. Fun to play with. Loads from its own pressurized fuel reserve.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.Name: TGBM_WisentMMG
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: medium machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted rifle-caliber machine gun. Considered the standard in most aspects and is the indecisive logistics manager's catch-all solution.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.Name: TGBM_WisentHMG
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: heavy machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A wide-caliber mounted heavy machine gun. Effective for tearing down cover, taking down large targets and destroying limbs with its solid slugs.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: grenade machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted grenade machine gun. Due to its rapid fire capability with explosive rounds, it can be said one has to be slightly crazy to use this weapon. Has a minimum arming range to ensure operator safety.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: recoilless rifle
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted recoilless rifle capable of firing explosive rounds. Due to its reloadability, one does not have to be that crazy to use it. Has a minimum arming range to ensure operator safety.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.Name: TGBM_ExposedMinigun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: minigun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted rotary machine gun that uses an electric motor to quickly cycle rounds through it. It is far more effectively used when in a fixed position rather than handheld, such example can be seen here; mounted on a vehicle.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: coaxial machine gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted variant of a rifle-caliber machine gun.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: inferno launcher turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A lightly-armored turret with a mechanoid-style flamebolt launcher. Takes fuel directly from the chemtank of the vehicle. Quite devastating against soft targets and flammable structures, but struggles against armored targets.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: military turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: An automated intermediate-caliber twin turret designed for urban combat.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: badger chain gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A light ergonomic turret with improved fire control systems and smoke grenade launchers. Fires high-explosive rounds, which make it perform well against soft targets but poorly against armor.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: bow autocannon
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A vehicle-mounted self-loading cannon. Although considered overkill by most, it was designed to meet the needs of planetary defense armies facing insectoid and mechanoid hordes.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: flak turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: An ancient-pattern flak emplacement mounted on vehicles such as self-propelled artillery. Originally designed to take down high-flying aircraft at the time, but can be angled to the surface to fire on ground targets.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Mounted turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted medium machine gun.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Mounted turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted heavy machine gun.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Mounted turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted light machine gun.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Mounted turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A mounted grenade machine gun. Has a minimum arming range to ensure operator safety.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.Name: TGBM_PaladinTurretCopyBase
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: paladin smoke grenade launcher
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A smoke grenade launcher mounted on a Paladin LAV. Excellent for providing smoke cover to infantry, this turret has no offensive capabilities.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: paladin EMP grenade launcher
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: An EMP grenade launcher mounted on a Paladin LAV.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: paladin explosive grenade launcher
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: An explosive grenade launcher mounted on a Paladin LAV.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: anti-tank turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A long-range, direct-fire turret with an autoloader. Offers similar performance to the Marshal's turret.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: paladin chain gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A light ergonomic turret with improved fire control systems and smoke grenade launchers. Fires high-explosive rounds, which make it perform well against soft targets but poorly against armor.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Z277 Turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: Fires VERY quickly.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Z277 Turret
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: Meant for destroying static positions.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Saturn 7 Main gun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: Fires shells at near-instant speeds.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Saturn 7 Laser machinegun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A rapid-fire laser weapon.

Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.label: Saturn 7 Laser machinegun
Vehicles.VehicleTurretDef.description: A rapid-fire laser weapon.
